hero.title: Give your entire team data superpowers
hero.lead: Your marketing team can analyze campaign performance. Your sales team can track pipeline metrics. Your finance team can query revenue data. All without knowing SQL or waiting for data engineers.
hero.subtext: Upload your data once. Create AI agents that understand your business. Every team member gets instant answers to their data questions through simple conversation.
hero.subHighlight: Transform data access from bottleneck to superpower.

governedDataProducts.title: Every team becomes data-driven
governedDataProducts.description: Marketing measures campaign ROI in real-time. Sales forecasts deals accurately. Finance closes books faster. Operations optimizes processes. No SQL knowledge required.

unifiedLakehouseFabric.title: Decisions made in minutes, not days
unifiedLakehouseFabric.description: Ask a question, get an answer. No tickets. No waiting. No back-and-forth emails. Your teams move at the speed of thought instead of the speed of your data team's backlog.

agenticAutomation.title: Data engineers focus on what matters
agenticAutomation.description: Stop writing repetitive queries. Build infrastructure. Design systems. Solve hard problems. AI agents handle the routine data requests that consume your day.

items.label: Marketing teams
items.description: Which channels drive conversions? What's our CAC by segment? How do campaigns compare month-over-month? Get answers in seconds instead of waiting days for data team support.

items.label: Sales teams
items.description: Ask about deal velocity, win rates, quota attainment. Forecast revenue. Identify at-risk opportunities. Sales reps become data-savvy without learning BI tools.

items.label: Finance & operations
items.description: Query expenses, revenue trends, operational metrics on demand. No more manual report generation. Finance closes books faster. Operations identifies bottlenecks in real-time.

features.heading: Three ways we augment your teams
features.subtitle: Upload data, create agents, empower everyone. Simple setup, transformative results.

connectEverySource.title: Make all your data accessible
connectEverySource.description: Upload spreadsheets, connect databases, centralize datasets. Everyone sees the data they're authorized to access. No more 'Can someone pull this for me?' Slack messages.

semanticControlPlane.title: Keep security without sacrificing speed
semanticControlPlane.description: IT controls who sees what. Audit logs track everything. Teams get instant access to their data without compromising security or compliance. Best of both worlds.

agentAutomationStudio.title: Turn questions into insights automatically
agentAutomationStudio.description: AI agents understand your business context. Ask in plain language, get accurate answers. Your team spends time acting on insights instead of requesting reports.

lakehouse.heading: Built for business teams, trusted by IT
lakehouse.description: Your teams get the freedom to explore data. Your IT team maintains control and visibility. Everyone wins.

unifiedGovernance.title: Security and compliance built in
unifiedGovernance.description: Define access permissions once. Track every query automatically. Meet compliance requirements without blocking business users. IT stays in control while teams stay productive.

programmablePipelines.title: Data stays fresh automatically
programmablePipelines.description: Upload data once or connect live sources. Schedule refreshes. Set up automatic updates. Your teams always work with current data without manual syncing.

compliantCollaboration.title: Full audit trail for every question
compliantCollaboration.description: Who asked what, when, and what data they accessed. Complete visibility for compliance reviews, security audits, and troubleshooting. Peace of mind for IT leaders.

secondary.heading: Real scenarios from real teams
secondary.description: See how different teams use AI agents to multiply their impact.

adaptiveGuardrails.title: Marketing: Optimize spend mid-campaign
adaptiveGuardrails.description: Marketing manager asks 'Which campaigns have CPA above $50?' Identifies underperforming channels. Reallocates budget same day. Improves ROI without waiting for analytics team.

explainableDecisions.title: Sales: Forecast accurately without spreadsheets
explainableDecisions.description: Sales director asks 'What's our forecast for Q4 based on current pipeline?' Gets instant projection. Identifies coverage gaps. Adjusts hiring and territory plans proactively.

lakehouseSignals.title: Finance: Close books in half the time
lakehouseSignals.description: Finance analyst queries revenue by segment, expenses by category, variances from budget. Generates reports instantly instead of spending days pulling data. Closes monthly faster.

architecture.heading: Simple for users, powerful for IT
architecture.description: Business teams talk to AI agents. IT manages data governance. Platform handles everything in between.

dataIntegrationLayer.title: Users: Just upload and ask
dataIntegrationLayer.description: Upload a spreadsheet. Ask a question in plain language. Get an answer explained in business terms. No training required. No SQL. No complex BI tools.

semanticGovernanceLayer.title: IT: Set permissions once
semanticGovernanceLayer.description: Define who accesses what data. Platform enforces rules automatically. Audit logs capture everything. Change permissions anytime. Security without manual intervention.

agenticExecutionLayer.title: AI: Understand context, generate insights
agenticExecutionLayer.description: Agents learn your datasets and business terminology. Convert questions to queries. Validate data quality. Explain results clearly. Improve with every interaction.

ai.heading: What your teams can do with AI agents
ai.description: Real capabilities that transform how teams work with data.

insightCopilots.title: Ask questions in plain language
insightCopilots.description: No SQL. No formulas. Just ask like you're talking to a colleague: 'Show me Q3 revenue by product line' or 'Which customers are at risk of churning?' Agents understand business language.

composableSkills.title: Get analyses, not just numbers
composableSkills.description: Agents don't just return data. They calculate trends, identify anomalies, compare time periods, and explain what changed. Turn data into actionable insights automatically.

closedLoopActuators.title: Schedule reports, automate workflows
closedLoopActuators.description: Create standing reports: 'Send weekly sales summary every Monday.' Set up alerts: 'Notify me if churn rate exceeds 5%.' Agents work continuously, not just when asked.

roadmap.heading: What we're building next
roadmap.subtitle: Features designed to give your teams even more power.

marketplaceConnectors.title: Connect more data sources
marketplaceConnectors.description: Beyond spreadsheets: Direct connections to your CRM, marketing platforms, financial systems. Pull data automatically instead of manual exports. Keep everything synchronized.

adaptiveGovernanceAi.title: Smarter data security
adaptiveGovernanceAi.description: Automatic detection of sensitive data. Intelligent masking of PII. Dynamic policies that adapt to context. Less manual configuration, better protection.

autonomousFinopsSuites.title: Handle larger datasets faster
autonomousFinopsSuites.description: Query optimization for big data. Intelligent caching. Better performance as your data grows. Scale from gigabytes to terabytes without slowdowns.

testimonials.heading: How teams multiply their impact
testimonials.subtitle: Real scenarios we've seen from organizations using this platform

items.quote: Before: Marketing team sent requests to data team, waited 2-3 days, got static reports that raised more questions. Now: Marketing asks AI agents directly, gets answers in seconds, iterates on analysis real-time. Campaign optimization happens daily instead of monthly.
items.author: Marketing Team

items.quote: Before: Finance spent first two weeks of every month gathering data, reconciling spreadsheets, generating reports. Now: AI agents handle data gathering automatically. Finance spends time on analysis and strategic planning. Monthly close happens in days, not weeks.
items.author: Finance Team
items.role: From data janitor to strategic advisor

cta.heading: See what your team can do
cta.description: Try it with your own data. Upload a spreadsheet, create an agent, ask some questions. See if this gives your team superpowers. Most teams know within an hour whether this changes how they work.
